select count(DISTINCT A.CONSTRUCTION_ID) from V_CBS_SGJDJC A inner join PC_AQSC_MOVE B on A.OP_TEAM=B.UNITID where A.start_time is not null
and A.op_team like #{search}||'%'
and A.cydid like #{search}||'%'
and A.well_common_name like '%'||UPPER(#{well_common_name})||'%'
and A.cydid like '%'||#{scdw}||'%'
and A.op_team like '%'||#{zydw}||'%'

SELECT W.* from( SELECT Z.* ,rownum row_num from ( select DISTINCT A.DESIGN_NUM,A.CONSTRUCTION_ID,A.WELL_COMMON_NAME,A.START_TIME,A.COMPLETE_TIME,A.OP_TEAM,A.SCDW ,A.cydid ,A.WELL_PURPOSE,A.sgdw zydw,A.zylx csfl from V_CBS_SGJDJC A inner join PC_AQSC_MOVE B on A.OP_TEAM=B.UNITID where A.start_time is not null
and A.op_team like #{search}||'%'
and A.cydid like #{search}||'%'
and A.well_common_name like '%'||UPPER(#{well_common_name})||'%'
and A.cydid like '%'||#{scdw}||'%'
and A.op_team like '%'||#{zydw}||'%'
order by A.OP_TEAM,A.well_common_name ) Z )W where row_num <=#{endRow} and row_num >= #{startRow}

SELECT to_char(STARTTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')STARTTIME, to_char(ENDTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')ENDTIME , SUSPEND_REASON ztyy from PC_AQSC_MOVE_PROCESS_SUSPEND where CONSTRUCTION_ID =#{construction_id} and pdid=#{pdid} order by STARTTIME

SELECT A.id termid,A .UNITNAME termname,B.CONSTRUCTION_ID did,B.WELL_COMMON_NAME,B.ITEM_NAME oper_project FROM PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id,CONSTRUCTION_ID,WELL_COMMON_NAME,ITEM_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.id,B.CONSTRUCTION_ID,B.WELL_COMMON_NAME,B.ITEM_NAME ,B.START_TIME, row_number() over(partition by B.OP_TEAM order by B.START_TIME DESC) row_number FROM PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE A INNER JOIN V_CBS_SGJDJC B ON A.id=B.OP_TEAM inner join PC_AQSC_MOVE C on B.OP_TEAM=C.UNITID WHERE PARENTID=#{parentid} AND UNITEPROPERTY2 LIKE '%作业队%' AND B.START_TIME IS NOT NULL ) WHERE row_number=1 )B ON A.id=B.ID WHERE A.PARENTID=#{parentid} AND A.UNITEPROPERTY2 LIKE '%作业队%' ORDER BY A.ID

SELECT CONSTRUCTION_ID,spname,SPID,PDID,SORT,STATE,SIGN, jh_time,lj_time, zt_time,sj_time, DECODE(jh_time,0,0,ROUND(zj/jh_time,2))zj_time FROM( SELECT CONSTRUCTION_ID,spname,SPID,PDID,SORT,STATE,SIGN,ROUND(NVL(leiji,0)/3600,2) lj_time,ROUND(NVL(zanting,0)/3600,2)zt_time ,jihua jh_time, CASE WHEN ROUND(NVL(leiji,0)/3600,2)=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(NVL(leiji,0)/3600,2) -ROUND(NVL(zanting,0)/3600,2) END sj_time, CASE WHEN ROUND(NVL(leiji,0)/3600,2)=0 or jihua is null or jihua =0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(jihua,0)-(ROUND(NVL(leiji,0)/3600,2) -ROUND(NVL(zanting,0)/3600,2)) END zj FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.CONSTRUCTION_ID,C.spname,A.SPID,A.PDID,A.SORT, A.STATE,A.SIGN,CEIL((A.ENDTIME - A.STARTTIME) * 24 * 60 * 60) AS leiji,B.zanting,A.USE_HOURS jihua FROM PC_AQSC_MOVE_PROCESS A INNER JOIN PC_AQSC_STA_PROCESS C ON C.SPID=A.SPID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pdid ,SUM(zt) zanting FROM ( SELECT pdid ,CEIL ((ENDTIME - STARTTIME) * 24 * 60 * 60) AS zt FROM PC_AQSC_MOVE_PROCESS_SUSPEND WHERE CONSTRUCTION_ID =#{construction_id} )GROUP BY pdid ) B ON B.PDID =A.PDID WHERE A.CONSTRUCTION_ID =#{construction_id} and (A.tab is null or A.tab='0') ORDER BY SORT ) )
mapper.insert: insert into PC_AQSC_CON_PRO_CONF ( OILFIELD, UNITID, REQUEST_DURATION, SP_FONT_FAMILY, SP_FONT_SIZE, TEAM_FONT_FAMILY, TEAM_FONT_SIZE, OP_FONT_FAMILY, OP_FONT_SIZE, WELL_FONT_FAMILY, WELL_FONT_SIZE, W_SP_FONT, ZT_SP_BACKGROUND, ZT_SP_FONT, ZZ_SP_BACKGROUND, ZZ_SP_FONT, WC_SP_BACKGROUND, WC_SP_FONT, CS_SP_BACKGROUND, JS_SP_BACKGROUND, BK_SP_BACKGROUND, FJ_SP_BACKGROUND, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME )values ( #{oilfield,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{request_duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sp_font_family,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sp_font_size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{team_font_family,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{team_font_size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{op_font_family,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{op_font_size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{well_font_family,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{well_font_size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{w_sp_font,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt_sp_background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt_sp_font,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zz_sp_background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zz_sp_font,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wc_sp_background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wc_sp_font,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cs_sp_background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{js_sp_background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bk_sp_background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fj_sp_background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate )

select G.* ,rownum row_num FROM( select UNITNAME construct_team, F.DID, F.WELL_COMMON_NAME, F.WORK_BRIEF, F.ORDER_CLASSES, to_char(F.report_time,'yyyy-MM-dd') REPORT_TIME, to_char(F.WORK_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') WORK_DATE, F.NEXT_CIRCUIT, F.IS_COMPLETE, F.CIRCUIT_NAME, F.COMPLETE_JUDGEMENT FROM PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE inner JOIN ( SELECT W.* FROM ( SELECT A.DID, A.TEAM_ID , A.ZYQID, B.TEAM_NAME, B.INTELLIGENCE_CODE, B.WELL_COMMON_NAME, B.WORK_BRIEF, B.ORDER_CLASSES, B.BEGIN_TIME_HOUR, B.REPORT_TIME, B.WORK_DATE, B.NEXT_CIRCUIT, B.CIRCUIT_NAME, B.IS_COMPLETE , CASE WHEN B.COMPLETE_JUDGEMENT='yes' THEN '是' ELSE '否' end COMPLETE_JUDGEMENT , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY B.TEAM_NAME,B.WELL_COMMON_NAME ORDER BY B.REPORT_TIME DESC, B.BEGIN_TIME_HOUR DESC)num FROM PC_AQSC_START_WELL A INNER JOIN PC_AQSC_TOUR_REPORT_WORKOVE B ON B.DID = A.DID WHERE A.OILFIELD=#{oilfield} AND ( A.END_TIME IS NULL or TRUNC(A.END_TIME,'DD') = TRUNC(SYSDATE,'DD')) )W WHERE w.num=1 )F ON F.TEAM_ID= PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE.id WHERE OILFIELD=#{oilfield} AND UNITEPROPERTY2 like '%作业队%'
and F.well_common_name like '%'||upper(#{well_common_name})||'%'
and PC_SYS_UNIT_CODE.UNITNAME like '%'||upper(#{construct_team})||'%'
and F.intelligence_code like '%'||upper(#{intelligence_code})||'%'
and to_char(F.report_time,'yyyy-MM-dd') =#{report_time}
and F.TEAM_ID like #{search}||'%'
and F.ZYQID like #{search}||'%'
ORDER BY ID )G

SELECT Q.DID, Q.PDID, Q.SPID, E.SPNAME, W.IS_COMPLETE FROM PC_AQSC_CON_STEP_PROCESS Q INNER JOIN PC_AQSC_STA_PROCESS E ON E.SPID=Q.SPID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT Q.DID,Q.PDID , CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 1 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END is_complete FROM ( SELECT DID, PDID FROM PC_AQSC_CON_STEP_SGDY WHERE DID=#{did} and QRSJ is not NULL GROUP BY DID,PDID ) Q INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.DID,A.PDID,A.tab FROM( SELECT DID, PDID,CASE WHEN QRSJ is NULL THEN '0' else '1' END tab FROM PC_AQSC_CON_STEP_SGDY WHERE DID=#{did} )A GROUP BY A.DID,A.PDID,A.tab ORDER BY A.PDID)W ON W.DID=Q.DID AND W.PDID =Q.PDID GROUP BY Q.DID,Q.PDID
)W ON Q.SPID = Q.SPID AND W.PDID = Q.PDID AND W.DID = Q.DID WHERE Q.DID=#{did} ORDER BY Q.XH ASC
SELECT xh,SGDYID, sgdymc ,SGDYLB,to_char(QRSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') qrsj FROM PC_AQSC_CON_STEP_SGDY where PDID=#{pdid} and did=#{did} order by xh asc
